statement: An end-to-end rubric + scoring run is executable today using the documented manual CLI flow, as long as evidence exists and the rubric has parsed successfully.
rationale: Manual workflow is documented and scoring seed enforces rubric parsing + evidence existence.
keyAssumptions: Rubric parsing succeeds for the chosen rubric model
Evidence rows exist for the window
validationCriteria: Manual workflow commands run without errors
critiquePoints: Evidence preprocessing is manual and may be missing
Lab TUI does not expose run creation without env flags
questions: Do we need any additional Convex indexes or schema tweaks for first run?
